content:
Prev: Beth, Miles, Walden, and Sara riding on Thomas Up: A Day Out with Thomas Next: Rusty controls

Timothy takes a snapshot



This is actually a working camera, but we never bother putting film in it...
Taken Sunday, November 17, 2002, 03:16:22pm.  Original image size: 2048x3072, 5.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/80s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
PS7 Colin 3.0 0:0 - 190:210 - 205:225 - 255:255, USM 100:1
